name: TRISTITIA (shelloss.jpg)
description:
this is heiDi, AgE 15.

she locked herself away after the inciDent.

the cat's name was norton.

the character's name was myo. her sister's name was letita.

she lives with her imaGiNary roomates.

she Is psYchologicALly damaged.

she Pretends to adore ero guro.

she's believing too manY things. she dreams of heLl.

it's very bright outside, even at Night.

she welcOMes you to schrödinger's reAlity.

you are free to decIpher her thoughts and codes.

do not use these thoughts for your pleasure. thank you.
